title: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When the user presses 'Ok' after setting the output location, an error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This error occurs because setting the output location and classpath are currently handled as two separate operations. As a result, setting the output location creates an illegal state.
SR:
1. Open the IDE and navigate to the project settings.
2. Select the option to set the output location.
3. Choose a new output folder.
4. Press 'Ok' to apply the changes.
5. Verify that the output location is set without any error message.
